reviewText: Very pleased with this video.  Used it as an extension with my class after reading the One and Only Ivan.  Students loved it!  Made wonderful connections with the novel and piqued their interest further into animal treatment and rights.
as I remember it, I have it on a bad copy VCR tape I made!
I get the message that this dvd is not formatted for my region.  What's up with that???
This was purchased for school. Seems to be a good educational video that can be used for a sub-day! Enjoy
